content: this pattern is inspired by the now-iconic mittens bernie sanders wore to joe biden and kamala harris s inauguration on january 20th 2021 they were gifted to him a few years ago by jen ellis a teacher in vermont @vtawesomeness on twitter updated pattern now includes * three sizes achieved by changing needle sizes * instructions for both afterthought and gusset thumb * drastically improved charts bernie s inauguration day statement mitts were cut from upcycled sweaters this obviously won t be an exact match but it s pretty darn close if you look closely at the mc section above the first chevrons you can see some decreases i believe the fabric for these was cut from the yoke of a sweater the original mittens also have a contrasting pattern on the reverse with an all-black palm i have chosen to repeat the brown pattern all around for simplicity this pattern is currently being tested if you have any notes or questions let me know i am offering this pattern for free if you want to say thank you you can send a tip via kofi at https //ko-fi com/threeeyecat or you can donate to your favorite charity every little bit helps
